title: Project Details given for your reference
description:
Project Details

  1. Project Identified by Shri Shubham Navale, Consultant
  • Projects:
  1. Traffic Analysis
  2. Crash and Accident Analysis
  3. Traffic Congestion Study
  4. Intersection Analysis and Design
  • Number of Students: 2
  • Department: ME - Transportation
  1. Projects Identified by Shri Jeet Tiwari
  • Projects:
  1. Road Safety Measures of the Black Spot
  2. Parking Management
  3. Smart City Planning
  4. Comprehensive Plan for Transportation
  5. Transport Planning
  • Number of Students: 2
  • Department: ME - Transportation
  1. Design & Development of Instruments and Fixtures for Tests to be Undertaken for Certification of Vehicles (Shri Pathak, Head SHD)
  • Number of Students: 2
  • Department: ME/BE - Mechanical
  1. Projects by Shri Suryawanshi, Head - RCD and IT
  • Number of Students: 2
  • Department: ME/BE - Computer Science
  1. Projects by Shri Sanket S. Dhanave, I/C - Fatigue Lab
  • For BE - Electronics:
  1. Design, Manufacturing & Commissioning of Dedicated Test Facility for Steering Lock Test as per ASI:074 & AIS:075
  2. Design, Manufacturing & Commissioning of Dedicated Test Facility for Heat Exchangers as per IS:13686 & IS:13687
  • For BE - Mechanical:
  1. Topology & Topography Optimization of Reaction Brackets, Test Setups for Mechanical Stiffness, Lower Weight & Higher Strength (Design & Manufacturing)
  • For ME - Mechanical:
  1. Test Setup Design for Mechanical Stiffness under Varied Load Cases
  • Number of Students:

  • 2 (BE - Mechanical)

  • Departments: BE - Electronics, BE - Mechanical, ME - Mechanical
